glite.user.name.description: Name of the user account used to run the gLite services on this JP node

glite.user.group.description: Group of the user specified in the 'glite.user.name' parameter. Leave it empty of comment it out to use the same as 'glite.user.name'

jpps.peers.description: file with list (one per line) of X509 certificate subjects of 'trusted peers', i.e. LB servers which may upload data to this JPPS

jpps.ftp.port.description: port for the ftp JPPS interface (bulk file transfers)

jpps.internal.description: directory where the JPPS files are stored (local path)

set.mysql.root.password.description: If this parameter is true, then the root password of the mysql database is set to the value specified in mysql.root.password if it not yet set. This parameter has no effect if the database root password is already set. It can be used to ease automated installation and configuration of the service, if mysql is not managed in some other way

jpps.debug.description: enables to pass various debug options to JP PS (e.g. -l path_to_log_file; -s XX number of forked slaves;....)

jpps.database.username.description: JP PS database user default: jpps

jpps.database.name.description: JP PS database name default: jpps
